content: AmerisourceBergen Corp said it expects stubbornly low generic drug prices  which have plagued drugmakers and wholesalers  to not deteriorate further next year  and brushed off concerns about Amazon's possible entry into the industry.
name: AmerisourceBergen Corporation (Holding Co)
title: AmerisourceBergen expects tumbling generic drug prices to settle

content: Sept 27 An AmerisourceBergen Corp unit will plead guilty on Wednesday to a misdemeanor and pay $260 million to resolve a U.S. probe into a pre-filled syringe program operated by a unit of the company that ceased operations in 2014.
